alert.note: Alert for Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau and southern Camden Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kings Ferry, or 8 miles west of Kingsland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Kings Bay Base, Kings Ferry, Cumberland Island, Harrietts Bluff and Colesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
